ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] silly questions from an old timer
ygData.msgSnippet: The bug USUALLY doesn t bite if everyone has either a haste spell - or a haste item.  Sometimes you seem to need both. It rarely bites two pulses in a row - so
ygData.messageBody:
The bug USUALLY doesn't bite if everyone has either a haste spell - or a
haste item. Sometimes you seem to need both.

It rarely bites two pulses in a row - so I make sure everyone I group with
knows about it - and knows to simply click it off if they seem to be slowed.

Slyde
58 Bard
Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Egelhof, Tobias [mailto:tobias.egelhof@...]
Sent: Friday, January 04, 2002 9:39 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: AW: [eqbards] silly questions from an old timer

welcome back min!

song timer cannot be removed as far as i know. but it helped me to twist 4
songs, never managed that before. otherwise try to ignore it.

level 52 haste song should give 15% haste, but it allows to exceed the
maximum haste cap. it is also an AE song, effecting all players around you,
not just your group (same as the chorus resistsongs and the 58 manasong).
sadly, the song seems to be bugged. had some situations where it caused
people to hit very slowly instead of faster.

so long
tobi
57 ghey bard
tholuxe

-----Urspr├╝ngliche Nachricht-----
Von: Cyr, Thierry
Gesendet am: Freitag, 4. Januar 2002 15:58
An: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Betreff: [eqbards] silly questions from an old timer

Well, I took a break from eq when daoc came out, and honestly love daoc, but
dying 3 times in a row at 30+ hurts like hell and is pretty demoralizing,
and well I kinda missed my eq guild (people are less chatty in daoc). So I
reactivated my account last night and am back in eq...

Question for the lot of ya:

Is there any way to disable the song timer?

It's driving me nuts, its throwing my timing off when I'm twisting songs.
Oh and another question, is the new 52 haste song better then the 54 haste
we have from before?

sorry, I been out of the loop for bout 3-4 months, trying to read up on as
much as possible in a short time.

Minkin
56 bard
A Ro
